1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A farewell series of 3 programmes celebrating the last 10 years of the phenomenally successful 'Monkey Business'. The series has followed the day -to -day lives of apes and monkeys at one of the largest primate rescue centres in the world. In today's programme we look back at the Monkey Business RESCUES.
